articles.title: CPRK Slams US, S. Korean Authorities for Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
articles.content:
CPRK Slams US, S. Korean Authorities for Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Sunday issued its information bulletin No. 1053 denouncing the U.S. and other forces hostile toward the DPRK for fabricating the "resolution on human rights of north Korea" peppered with false stories and plots at the 3rd Committee of the 68th UN General Assembly.
					 It said:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces joined those who allegedly "co-sponsored" the "resolution on human rights of north Korea". When the resolution was "rammed through", they "welcomed" it before any other country.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet forces invited the "special rapporteur of human rights" of the UN, the "special envoy of human rights" of the U.S. State Department and others to south Korea and had confabs to do harm to the DPRK. They made pamphlets so-called "report on human rights in north Korea" and circulated them to international bodies, getting frantic in such anti-DPRK human rights racket.
					
					 This is a grave politically-motivated provocation to tarnish the image of the DPRK and undermine its socialist system.
					
					 The anti-DPRK human rights racket kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet conservative group is nothing but a ridiculous scheme to conceal the real picture of south Korea which has turned into a colony of the U.S., tundra of democracy and human rights and divert elsewhere the people's mindset critical of the unpopular rule in south Korea.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean group which should be sit in the dock of the "human rights" issue.
					
					 They are seriously mistaken if they think they can do harm to the single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK through their anti-DPRK human rights racket.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the anti-DPRK human rights racket of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.

articles.title: Delegation of Grand People's Study House Returns Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Grand People's Study House Returns Home
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Grand People's Study House led by President Sin O Sun, came back here on Sunday after participating in the 1st Asian Forum of Chief Librarians held in China.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in Yonphyong Island Shelling Marked
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Kangryong County, South Hwanghae Province on Saturday to mark the 3rd anniversary of the victory in the Yonphyong Island shelling battle.
					 Present there were service personnel of the Korean People's Army, officials and other people of the county.
					
					 People and schoolchildren presented bouquets and garlands to the combatants who displayed their valor in the Yonphyong Island shelling, warmly congratulating them.
					
					 Ri Song Guk, commander of the 4th Corps of the KPA, in his speech said that the KPA, which is taking hold on the arms of Mt. Paektu given by the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, won the victory in the shelling battle.
					
					 The news that Yonphyong Island was engulfed in flames for two days after targets were hit by the shells fired by artillerymen of the KPA created a great sensation in the whole world. This instilled conviction of victory and courage into the people but threw the enemy into horror and uneasiness, he noted.
					
					 Through the shelling battle the service personnel of the unit hardened the conviction that they were capable of wiping out any enemy as they were led by the peerlessly illustrious commanders and there were the single-minded unity of the army and people.
					
					 Pak Yong Ho, chief secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his congratulatory speech extended warm congratulations and greetings to the service personnel who gave full play to the dignity of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and instilled great conviction into the people. If the enemy fires a shell to the DPRK, all the people will fight with the service personnel as they did that day three years ago and will win victory, he added.
					
					 Ri Jong Ok, chairman of the Kangryong County Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, in his congratulatory speech said that that day when there occurred the Yonphyong Island shelling officials, inhabitants and farmers in the county visited service personnel with aid materials they provided with sincerity and inspired them.
					
					 KPA officer Kim Kyong Su, Choe Yong Jin, head of the Hero Artillery Piece, said in their speeches that all service personnel would firmly prepare themselves to be a-match-for-a hundred artillerymen capable of hitting any target under any circumstances and make a prompt deadly counterattack against any slightest provocation of the enemy.
					
					 The meeting was followed by a performance given by the art squad of the KPA 4th Corps.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Beijing, November 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing gave a reception on Friday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the agreement on the economic and cultural cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and the People's Republic of China.
					 Present there on invitation were the vice-minister of Commerce of China and other officials concerned.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong in his speech said that the conclusion of the agreement laid the firm foundation for expanding the traditional DPRK-China friendship to various fields.
					
					 He stressed that the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started on Mt. Paektu will be successfully carried forward and accomplished as long as there are the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the unity of the army and people closely rallied around him with one idea and intention.
					
					 He wished the fraternal Chinese people bigger success in their drive to realize the dream of China under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Xi Jinping as its general secretary.
					
					 The vice-minister of Commerce of China said that over the past six decades China and the DPRK have waged the brisk exchange and cooperation in various fields including economy and culture through mutual support and friendly cooperation, adding:
					
					 We are rejoiced over the fact that the Korean people are registering successes in the drive for economic construction and improvement of the people's living standard under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un despite all sorts of trials.
					
					 We express the belief that greater progress would be made in the Sino-DPRK relations under the care of the leaders of the two countries and thanks to the common efforts of both sides.

articles.title: People, Service Personnel Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
articles.content:
People, Service Personnel Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people and school youth and children are visiting the Susan-ri House of Class Education in Kangso District Nampho City.
					 The house is a place indicting the U.S. imperialists and the class enemies for the bestial atrocities they committed in the period of   the temporary strategic retreat during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Displayed there are lots of evidence and data proving the shuddering atrocities of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and class enemies who ruthlessly killed more than 1 050 inhabitants which accounts for one third of the population of Susan-ri by the most bestial methods which would make even brutes blush.
					
					 On display at indoor halls and outdoor places of education are various kinds of torture tools, lethal weapons, lock of hair and relics, photo of feet being cut with rubber shoes on, etc.
					
					 The data showing cruel torture and killing of people regardless of age and sex by all methods prove that the U.S. imperialists are a herd of wolves in human skin.
					
					 Since its opening the house has been visited by at least 600 000 people.
					
					 Being briefed by lecturers on the truth that illusion about the enemies will cost a high price and that one should settle accounts with the enemies only with arms, the visitors determined a thousand-fold revenge on the enemies.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refers to Originality of Songun Idea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refers to Originality of Songun Idea
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says the Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the original one as it clarifies the new revolutionary theory that the driving force of revolution should be strengthened with the revolutionary army as the main force and the revolutionary struggle and construction work should be pushed forward by relying on the leading role of the revolutionary army.
					 The limitation of Marxism-Leninism was manifested in that it did not properly understand the position and role of the army in the revolution and construction and did not put forward the army as the important political force of the revolution, in particular, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Basing itself on the deep analysis of the development of the era and the changed social class relations, the WPK set forth the idea of giving precedence to the army over the working class and put forward the People's Army as the core unit and the main force of the revolution for the first time in the history of the revolutionary movement.
					
					 As shown by the history of the working-class revolutionary struggle, one can neither win victory in the revolution nor defend the revolution that had already been won unless one does not strengthen the revolutionary armed forces as the revolutionary struggle is accompanied with the standoff of strength with the counter-revolutionary forces. This is the principle and formula of the revolution.
					
					 The Songun idea defined the revolutionary army as the main force of the revolution and advanced the theory of building the strong revolutionary ranks with the army as a core for the first time in history. This is the great ideological and theoretical discovery which renovated the theory of forming the revolutionary force from its roots.
					
					 In order to advance the revolution and construction, it is necessary to have the steel-like ranks always playing the leading role.
					
					 The People's Army is making a breakthrough in the van of the revolutionary struggle and construction work in the era of Songun.
					
					 When the People's Army takes the lead in the revolution and construction and the army and people struggle in the soldier spirit, disposition and mettle in one mind, they will display incomparably great might.

articles.title: Cases of Child Abuse Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Cases of Child Abuse Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The cases of maltreatment of children are increasing in south Korea, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The puppet Ministry of Health and Welfare announced on November 19 that the number of cases of maltreatment of children reached over 6 400 last year, an increase of more than 350 cases compared with 2011.
					
					 The cases of child abuse in families account for more than 80 percent, in particular.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Policy of Agriculture Flayed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Policy of Agriculture Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The Way of Farmers with the People of south Korea, an organization grouping the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Association of the Environment and Agriculture Organizations and other peasants organizations, held a rally in Seoul on November 22 accusing the authorities of their unreasonable policy of wiping out agriculture and peasants.
					 Present at the rally were more than 20 000 peasants from across south Korea.
					
					 At the rally speakers said there was not a precedent by which dictatorial regimes took care of the peasants' living.
					
					 Saying that it is the essential requirements for preserving the weak agriculture to check the rice market from being opened and enforce the correct agricultural policy, they asserted that it is essential for the present "government" to settle such matters.
					
					 They stressed that they will wage the struggle for preserving the agriculture by the concerted efforts of peasants across the country.
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the rally. It urged the Park Geun Hye regime to take a measure for preserving agriculture.
					
					 Prior to the rally, the participants marched from Seoul Railway Station to the Seoul City Office.

articles.title: Abrogation of Status of Forces Agreement Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of Status of Forces Agreement Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- More than 30 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification had a press interview before the U.S. embassy in Seoul on November 18 accusing the U.S. of its impudent act.
					 The organizations disclosed that the U.S. illegally accumulated at least one trillion won out of the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces which it collected from the south Korean people.
					
					 They revealed the fact that the U.S. always forced the south Korean authorities to raise the expenses for its troops to accumulate more funds and used to allocate them for building military objects.
					
					 They criticized the U.S. for earning the interests worth hundreds of billions won by lending out those funds.
					
					 The south Korean "government" should take back all those funds as they were not legally grounded, they added.
					
					 They held that the U.S. calls for more than one trillion won expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces for 2014 as they slight the south Korean people.
					
					 Noting that most of the south Korean people are calling for freezing the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces, they stressed that the "government" should abrogate the unequal south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement".

articles.title: Brazilian Communist Party Express Support for WPK and Korean People
articles.content:
Brazilian Communist Party Express Support for WPK and Korean People
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The 13th Congress of the Brazilian Communist Party expressed support and solidarity for the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people in their just struggle.
					 A decision adopted at the congress on November 16 said that the DPRK has been exposed to severe blockade and economic sanctions by the imperialists for many years. It went on:
					
					 Of late the WPK adopted an important decision for more dynamically pushing forward socialist construction and laid down the task for developing science and technology of the country to step up the industrial revolution in the new century and decisively improve the people's living standard.
					
					 Today the grave situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. introduced a lot of nukes into south Korea and has yet stationed tens of thousands of troops there.
					
					 The peninsula is in constant danger of war due to the imperialists' sanctions and pressure against the DPRK and the ceaseless U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party expresses support and solidarity for the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for defending the national sovereignty and achieving the country's peaceful reunification.

articles.title: British Organizations Condemns South Korean Warmongers' Arms Buildup
articles.content:
British Organizations Condemns South Korean Warmongers' Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on November 10 denouncing the south Korean warmongers for their arms buildup. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are seeking to introduce the latest weapons and equipment from the U.S. under the pretext of "coping with the nuclear and missile threat" of the DPRK.
					
					 They also confirmed to purchase Global Hawk by spending a huge amount of funds, blustering that they would constantly monitor and spy on all areas and strategic targets in the DPRK.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet warmongers are increasing the latest war hardware after concluding the "tailored deterrence strategy" with their U.S. master.
					
					 Such moves prove that the "improved relations" and "confidence- building" touted by south Korean puppet forces are nothing but nonsense.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is What Keeps Our People Alive" was posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on November 14.
					 The work published on November 14, Juche 81 (1992) deals with the necessity of defending the global movement of socialism and the cause of socialism and indicates the tasks for defending and advancing the cause of socialism and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Kuwait, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Kuwait, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by the Kuwait House of Works and a photo exhibition by the Art and Culture Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria on November 11 and 17 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with his immortal revolutionary life and exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were pictures introducing the successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yousef Al Amiri, chairman of the Kuwaiti Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent statesman who turned the DPRK into a political and military power by carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people led by Kim Jong Un are waging a dynamic struggle to build a reunified thriving nation desired by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director and the vice-director of the Art and Culture Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria praised Kim Jong Il for performing the undying feats for the cause of global independence, expressing the belief that the Korean people would certainly build a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated with due ceremony in Moscow on November 18.
					 Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events and information activities to introduce the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man and his immortal exploits on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Karelia of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Karelia of Russia
 Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A Karelia committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il of Russia was formed on November 18.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from November 18 to December 25 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to introduce the immortal revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.
